title: SPECATACULAR ONE OF A KIND: VIEWS, ARCHITECTURE AND LOCATION!
map_address: 1147 N. Clark St near Ozetta terrace
posting_body: Sophisticated, sleek and spacious with a phenomenal view in a great location.
Highest quality when built with a meticulous restoration to match.

Built by award-winning architect to house “talent” visiting “the coast” in 1963, its residents have enjoyed their walnut wet-bar, fireplace and large terrace gracefully perched over the west end of the Sunset Strip ever since.
In addition to the view, this top (4rth) floor, corner apartment boasts NEST controlled central A/C and in-unit laundry.
Entering the apartment, you’re immediately greeted by the iconic LA view across the basin to DTLA’s skyline.
Floor to ceiling glass and the terrace beyond run the full length of the apartment, visually extending the space out toward the horizon.
The floor to ceiling (9’) windows used throughout the apartment provide excellent natural light and magical views from dusk to dawn.
Light hardwood floors sweep throughout the space and compliment the original book-matched walnut cabinetry.
A Knoll-like floating wet-bar and fireplace are an entertainer’s dream.
The one-of-a-kind kitchen features more walnut cabinetry and floor-to-ceiling glass along with high-end stainless-steel appliances; the counters, backsplash and floors are all gleaming quartz.
A 9’ pocket door allows the kitchen to be closed off from the public space to accommodate more formal entertaining.
The bedroom also boasts a 9’ ceiling and walls of glass facing south and west for views from the Strip to Century City, Beverly Hills, and beyond.
The mosaic tile bath features double basins and separate tub and shower.
Other amenities include a washer and dryer, NEST controlled central A/C and heat, lots of storage and custom lighting.
Our intimate building also features a 360-degree roof-deck with views and secluded pool out back.
Building is controlled access.
Will consider well trained pet (under 20lbs).
The best of urban lifestyles; in the middle of it all, yet with generously sized, light and airy calm space.
Easy access to the historic Sunset Strip, Beverly Hills, Cedars-Sinai UCLA, luxury shopping and dining.
APARTMENT FEATURES INCLUDE:
*Dramatic Panoramic Views
*Large Terrace
*Floor to Ceiling Walls of Glass (9’ ceilings)
*In-unit Washer and Dryer
*Restored Book-Matched Walnut Cabinetry
*Fireplace
*Wet-bar
*Hardwood Floors (throughout)
*NEST controlled Central A/C and Heat
*Stunning kitchen with high-end stainless-steel appliances
*Top Floor Corner
*Roof-deck with 360-degree views
*Intimate Pool
*Designed by LA Conservancy Modern Master Architect
*Pristine Restoration
*Quiet, Controlled Access Building
*Rent Stabilized
